data.title: Where Have You Seen Geekâ€™d Con Guest Kevin Durand Before?
data.meta_description: The actor is coming to Shreveport's comic con, Geek'd Con, this month. And his resume is pretty freakin' big.
data.text:
Shreveport's comic con, Geek'd Con, is coming back to Downtown Shreveport this August. The 2024 Geek'd Con will take place August 16th, 17th, and 18th, at the Shreveport Convention Center.

Tickets for this year's Geek'd Con are available right now. You can get yours here: https://geekdcon.ticketspice.com/geekd-con-2024

Geek'd Con has become one of the biggest "comic con" style events in the state of Louisiana since it started in Downtown Shreveport back in 2015. The event has welcomed over 10,000 fans each weekend since the start. It has also brought millions of dollars in economic impact to the Shreveport and Bossier area.

Every year there are dozens of celebrities that attend the event. From blockbuster movie stars to anime voice actors, and of course...comic book creators. The guest lineup will for 2024 includes movie icon Billy Zane, Scrubs star John C. McGinley, the voice of Master Chief from the Halo franchise Steve Downes, the stars of E.T. Henry Thomas & Dee Wallace, the voice of Mickey Mouse Bret Iwan, and many more incredibly talented celebrities.

One of the latest additions to this year's lineup is actor Kevin Durand.

Kevin Durand is having an incredible 2024. So far this year he has starred in the new horror movie Abigail, and was the main antagonist in the blockbuster film Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes.

But his career isn't limited to his successful 2024. Durand has been on the Hollywood grind for a minute now. His resume includes some big name franchises in film and on TV. Check out these projects you might know him from:

X-Men Origins: Wolverine

The Strain

Legion

Vikings

Swamp Thing

Resident Evil: Retribution

Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me

Walking Tall

Smokin' Aces

Wild Hogs
